title: PLZ PLZ HELP
body: MY ACONT HAS HACK AND NOW CANOT GET IN HAW I CAN GOT BACK MY ACONT PLZ PLZ HELP :(

replies.body: Hey there, rest easy, we can help!  Fill out our [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and a member of our account team can help you update your info and assist with restoring access.   We'll reply back as soon as we can!  In the meantime, if you have any questions keep it to this post.  ^^
